vulnerabilities.name: Windows SmartScreen Security Feature Bypass
vulnerabilities.description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists in Windows SmartScreen that could allow an attacker to bypass the SmartScreen user experience.

vulnerabilities.name: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen Bypass
vulnerabilities.description: A security feature bypass vulnerability in Windows Defender SmartScreen.

vulnerabilities.name: Windows Kernel Elevation of Privilege
vulnerabilities.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows kernel that could allow local privilege escalation.

vulnerabilities.name: Windows TCP/IP Remote Code Execution
vulnerabilities.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in Windows TCP/IP stack affecting IPv6.
vulnerabilities.recommendedAction: Apply August 2024 security updates or disable IPv6

vulnerabilities.name: Windows Error Reporting Service EoP
vulnerabilities.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in Windows Error Reporting Service.

vulnerabilities.name: Windows MSHTML Platform Spoofing
vulnerabilities.description: A spoofing vulnerability in the MSHTML Platform used by Internet Explorer mode.

vulnerabilities.name: Windows DWM Core Library EoP
vulnerabilities.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in Windows DWM Core Library.

vulnerabilities.name: Office and Windows HTML RCE
vulnerabilities.description: A remote code execution vulnerability affecting Office and Windows via malicious documents.
vulnerabilities.recommendedAction: Update Office to latest version and apply Windows security updates

vulnerabilities.name: Windows Kerberos Security Bypass
vulnerabilities.description: A security feature bypass vulnerability in Windows Kerberos authentication.
vulnerabilities.recommendedAction: Apply January 2024 security updates to domain controllers

vulnerabilities.name: Windows AppLocker Driver EoP
vulnerabilities.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows AppLocker driver.

insights.title: Active Exploits Detected
insights.description: 6 vulnerabilities affecting your devices are being actively exploited in the wild.
insights.recommendedAction: Prioritize patching CVE-2024-21412, CVE-2024-30088, and other actively exploited vulnerabilities.

insights.title: Critical Vulnerabilities
insights.description: 3 critical severity vulnerabilities require immediate attention.
insights.recommendedAction: Apply available patches for critical vulnerabilities as highest priority.

insights.title: Patch Coverage
insights.description: Patches are available for all detected vulnerabilities.
insights.recommendedAction: Develop a patching schedule to address all vulnerabilities based on severity.
